response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us at $1,200,000. We understand its significance to you and believe it could be a game-changer in your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to ensure that you not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from a favorable transaction.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents an exceptional chance to own a product that is worth more than what we are asking. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will guide you through the next steps to finalize the purchase.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
